game_description: Looking for a short, fun, first person shooter game to play in virtual reality? Then The Heist VR is the game for you! The Heist VR is a fun, fast-paced arcade shooter for the Oculus Quest. Play as an experienced thief as you infiltrate 3 different locations and escape with the cash. You must defend yourself from the incoming police as you wait for your bomb to explode and force your way through the armored doors.
review_1: Let’s get this straight, needs a LOT of work. Environments can be better, you get a little bit tired of seeing just polygons. But it’s definitely got the biggest arcade feel I’ve ever played in over 80+ games I own. And for some reason it kept drawing me back in at the time, playing while I was waiting for a game to update, install, or if I had nothing to do. I’d just play 1-2 matches of this. Also the music is straight fire, but needs more “remixes” for different maps. Just try the game overall, it’s free. And you can just uninstall it later.

review_3: It’s not really worth your time compared to other FREE vr games like Pavlov or battle talent. Don’t expect too much from it.
